title: write or send email program switches off
content: most days i open mozilla thunder bird i can read e-mails no problem as soon as i go to write e-mail thunderbird switches off and i have to restart computer
creator: waterwise

title: Downloading messages to my inbox fails with a message sent that says ...Server Centurylink.net has disconnected.  The server may have gone down....It happens most every time I open Thunderbird.    Suggestions, please.
content: If there is something that I need to adjust, please advise. I have not made any adjustments to my APP. Do I need to make one or more? Thanks for your time. JFCamp.
creator: jfcamp

title: Allegati non visibili
content: Buongiorno, è da un po' di tempo che ho un problema abbastanza fastidioso con Thunderbird. Capita che arrivino da parte di clienti delle mail veloci senza oggetto e senza testo contenenti però un allegato. Quello che succede è che Thunderbird non mi indica in nessun modo che è presente l'allegato, me ne accorgo SOLO se premo il tasto inoltra. In quel momento (e solo in quel frangente) mi compare l'allegato (principalmente pdf) che posso scaricare/aprire normalmente. Avevo installato l'ultima versione stabile di thunderbird (quella normalmente scaricabile dal sito), ho provato una versione beta per vedere se era un problema solo dell'ultima versione ma non cambia nulla anche lì.
creator: ligabuefabio

title: Moving folder issues
content:
I have an issue with folders being accidentally moved and potential loss of data as a result.

The problem seems to arise when using the vertical scroll bar in the Folders pane. If the cursor moves to the left of the scroll bar during scrolling the cursor will sometimes pick up a folder and then drop it in a different location when the mouse button is released. This has happened to me several times. Sometimes I see it happen and others I don't.

The problem:

The moved folder may reappear in a new location or it may disappear. I recently discovered a folder on my laptop that was in the wrong place (it had become a subfolder) and it can only have got there following an accidental move. I verified that the folder still contained emails. I then moved it deliberately (up one level so that it was no longer a subfolder) using drag and drop and it disappeared. A search for the content of the emails yielded no results and looking in my profile folder I could see no files that related to the missing folder. It therefore apprears that the entire folder has been expunged from the profile on this machine in some way.

When I access my emails from a different machine, a desktop, the folder in question is present, in the correct place and contains emails. These two profiles are accesing the same IMAP server but one is showing the folder and the other not.

Questions:

How should I best reinstate the folder on my laptop?

If I want to deliberately move a folder in the future what is the best way to do this?

In the event of noticing an accidental move in the future what is the best way to reverse it?

If Mozilla could introduce a verification (with a cancel option) dialoge upon a folder move I believe that it would be a beneficial feature.

Many thanks for any help that can be offered.
creator: allan55

title: Will my emails be deleted after completing a Windows "refresh"?
content:
My laptop, which is running Windows 8.1, recently wouldn't boot up properly due to an error and after much agony it finally gave me the option of "refreshing" Windows without deleting my files but unfortunately all programs/apps which I've installed will be deleted including Thunderbird.

My question is will all my emails also be deleted along with Thunderbird or are they considered to be files, meaning Windows won't dispose of them and they'll be restored once I install Thunderbird again? I have no way of backing them up as the laptop only boots up as far as recovery options so I'd like to know before I go ahead with the refresh.

Thanks
creator: zinc_plus_mag

title: how to use /dev/shm for global-messages-db.sqlite?
content:
How can I tell thunderbird on Linux to create and use global-messages-db.sqlite in an arbitrary directory, eg /dev/shm instead of slow NFS storage? I know it will be gone on the next reboot, but that doesn't matter to me.

Regards Harri
creator: Harridu

title: An account has been blocked by administrator due to suspected SPAM activity thunderbird
content:
Hello, i can't send messages because of this problem: An account has been blocked by administrator due to suspected SPAM activity thunderbird

Can you help me?

title: Vacation
content: I am going on vacation for 10 days how do i stop having e mail come through for just those days.
creator: jenneanreed

title: Migration from Thunderbird 91 to 102 - Missing account
content: Hello, I just installed Thunderbird 102 over a previous installation on Windows 10. I had 6 account/mailboxes. At the restart of Thunderbird, I had only 5. The account "katamail.com" is gone and I cannot see my messages. But they still are inside "E:\POSTA\Mail\pop.katamail-1.com\" . Or, at least, I hope so. There, there are the file Inbox and Sent of several megabytes. How could I recover that account? The other 5 have been read/recovered automatically... Many thanks for the support! Matteo
creator: ing.barison

title: Painel de exibição de mensagens em grade
content: Atualizei recentemente meu Thunderbird e as linhas (grades) do painel de mensagens sumiu. A visualização em grade, com as linhas em cinza e branco facilita a visualização e localização de mensagens. Como voltar essa opção de visualização?
creator: leticia6

title: Cant login to my @yandex.ru mailbox
content:
Hi!

A few months ago, I stopped receiving letters from my @yandex domain email address. When I attempted to relogin, I encountered an authentication issue and was unable to do so.

I'll attach a screenshot of the unsuccessful login attempt.

I'm hoping you can help.

Best wishes Artem B.

title: export email from previous verison to latest one
content: I'm using Thunderbird 78 and I have local folder which contains several hundreds of mails, I need to import export these email messages with their folder and import them to Thunderbird 102. I see export function doesn't exist in Thunderbird 78 while It's already present in 102 version. What do you suggest please?
creator: buckroger2011

title: Unable to send messages from Thunderbird to Spectrum server
content: I cannot send messages using Thunderbird. I can receive them. This problem suddenly started the last week of April 2023. I have checked settings and they are correct. The error message indicates that the message is being lost in transmission (to the Spectrum server). Spectrum will not help since I am able to send messages using the Spectrum server without Thunderbird. I am using a POP server, not IMAP. Thanks.
creator: greatspirit

title: Quick Filter toolbar
content: Why does Thunderbird KEEP switching it off?
creator: jeremypoynton

title: Thunderbird becomes unresponsive every few minutes for several minutes
content:
I'm running Thunderbird 102.11.0 und Xubuntu 22.04 with only a single Addon installed (Owl) and it becomes unresponsive every few minutes for several minutes.

This happens on two different computers (same OS setup).

Unresponsiveness happens on arbitrary actions like switching folders, navigating settings whatever.

Both machines have at least 16 GB of RAM.
creator: alexander.zeitler

title: Errore visualizzazione risultati ricerca
content:
Salve a tutti,

Da tempo riscontro questi problemi, malgrado i diversi aggiornamenti. In sostanza, i risultati di ricerca non sono attendibili per due motivi.

Il primo: risulta a volte errato l'account mittente di un messaggio presente come risultato di ricerca. Allego due schermate: una che riporta l'errore eseguendo TB normalmente, l'altra eseguendolo in modalità di risoluzione di problemi (plugin disattivati e quant'altro).

Il secondo: può capitare che ricercando dei messaggi usando una parola di ricerca, questa non produca alcun risultato, malgrado la presenza di messaggi che corrispondono a quella chiave di ricerca. Esempio: cercando "planet" non mi sono usciti i messaggi già inviati ad un indirizzo email che include la parola "planetvideo".

Tutto questo si è presentato malgrado abbia più volte: - riavviato TB; - riavviato il PC; - aggiornato TB; - aggiornato il sistema operativo; - cancellata la cache di TB.

Faccio presente che per convenienza, ogni volta che ne ho avuto bisogno, ho creato un backup del profilo e l'ho ripristinato sulla nuova installazione di TB, ad esempio, quando ho cambiato sistema operativo passando da una distribuzione di Linux all'altra..

Allego alcune informazioni estratte da TB. Saluti.

title: Outgoing SMTP authentication error with Gmail
content: Hello, I am at my wits end :) I have followed everything here ( https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-and-gmail ) and still am have problems sending email with gmail accounts in TB. Incoming seems spotty too. I have read everything I could prior to reaching you here and cannot find a solution. This has been ongoing for a month. At times email will send for just brief time. The only thing I have not tried on that linked page is anything under that "Archiving messages" and "Subscribing to folders and synchronizing messages" sections. Thank you, Dave
creator: davidsmythe62

title: Add Security Exception - Sectigo Limited
content: Every time I open Thunderbird email, "Add Security Exception" pops up. The issuer is Sectigo Limited. Should I confirm the exception and, if not, how do I fix this?
creator: info9242

title: Direcciones de correo
content: Buenas tardes en cliente de correo thunderbird de mozilla cuando uno redacta un correo este va guardando las direcciones de correo enviados cosa que si uno envia un mail de nuevo este ya recuerda la direccion ...esto esta genial...el problema que tengo es que yo mi maquina la tengo protegida con deep Freeze para que no se me modifique la configurcion ...los correso ls guardo en carpetas en otro disco eso no ha problema ..el tema es que cuando apago la maquina el recordatorio de las direcciones de mail se me borra y no se como hacer para configurarlo en una carpeta de otro disco como hago con los correos los direcciono asi como muestro en la imagen Gracias por su tiempo Ricardo
creator: ricardoaguirrelorca

title: Elektronický podpis v Thunderbirdu pod Windows 11
content: Dobrý den. Léta používám datovou schránku a s ní spojený elektronický podpis pro soukromou osobu, vydaný Českou poštou. Starý počítač s Win 10 však mele z posledního, pořídila jsem si nový s Win 11 a ze zálohy do něj importovala certifikát. Vše je nastaveno, ale pod WIn 11 selže odeslání zprávy prý proto, že v daném úložišti certifikát nenajde, nebo je starý. Podle operátora helpdesku České pošty je nastavení v pořádku a kontrola certifikátu přes iSignum proběhla také bez potíží. Pro kontrolu jsem certifikát ještě zkusila ze stejné zálohy naimportovat do malého laptopu s Win 10, zde bez problémů funguje. Laptop má však jen minidisk pro systém + 1 databázi (kvůli které jsem si ho pořizovala), takže pro úřední dokumenty už na něm nemám místo. Thunderbird pod Win 11 certifikát ze zálohy naimportuje, zobrazí, vyexportuje, jen při podpisu zprávy ho nenajde. Můžete mi poradit, co s tím? Děkuji.
creator: urbancova.sylva

title: Sincronização de e-mail

title: Hanging while downloading mail - have to restart Tbird a few times to get all day's mail
content:
We have one install which does not want to complete download when there are many emails. It downloads a handful and then hangs and never completes. A total quit and restart often means that it resumes and sometimes it takes 3x restart to get up to date. A few days ago the log showed many timeouts but today there is not much apart from the following message. Could this, whatever it is - be the cause?

1684431111720 addons.xpi WARN Checking C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Thunderbird\distribution\extensions for addons Warning: attempting to write 5138 bytes to preference mail.server.server3.userName. This is bad for general performance and memory usage. Such an amount of data should rather be written to an external file. This preference will not be sent to any content processes. Found 0 public keys and 0 secret keys (0 protected, 0 unprotected)
creator: studio77

title: Thunderbird Inbox problem
content:
I've used Mozilla Thunderbird almost since its inception. The current version is 102.11.0 (32 bit), running on my PC, Windows 10 Pro, version 10.0.19045.

I have two e-mail accounts that I use, from the same server/provider. One account I've been using for about 20 years and the second account is more recent. The older account is used almost exclusively, and the newer account is used much less. On the older account I annually archive the inbox messages to folders by year, to keep the inbox fairly clean. Most recently my inbox contained messages from 2022 and 2023 to date.

I've experienced an annoying problem on the older account for the past several months. Each message that comes in arrives in duplicate, requiring me to go through the messages daily and delete every other one. I noticed that there were a very few senders whose messages did not come in duplicate, for some reason. I updated to the present version about 10 days ago, hoping it would solve the problem but it did not.

Then, about a week ago I could not open the inbox. The message said to wait while Thunderbird processes the inbox and when it finished the inbox was empty except for a few random messages from years ago.

I also have not been receiving any new messages in that time. I do receive the e-mails on my iPhone and my laptop with no problem, and I do not experience the problem with my newer e-mail account. Can anyone help me get my inbox back and start receiving e-mails properly again? Help, please!
creator: CWTL
